text.autoconfig.itemcounts.title: Item Counts Config
text.autoconfig.itemcounts.option.showAc: Show the selected item-icon as well
text.autoconfig.itemcounts.option.active: Configure offset of text relative to crosshair
x > 0 moves text right, x < 0 moves text left
y > 0 moves text down, y < 0 moves text up
text.autoconfig.itemcounts.option.showOf: Show the offhand item-icon as well
text.autoconfig.itemcounts.option.offhan: Configure offset of text relative to crosshair
x > 0 moves text right, x < 0 moves text left
y > 0 moves text down, y < 0 moves text up
text.autoconfig.itemcounts.option.showOn: Show item-count for all items in hotbar
text.autoconfig.itemcounts.option.showHo: Show the hotbar item-icons as well
text.autoconfig.itemcounts.option.hotbar: Configure offset of text relative to hotbar slots
x > 0 moves text right, x < 0 moves text left
y > 0 moves text down, y < 0 moves text up
